Sentencas: HighlightsBulk-heterostructure electrolytes based on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta and SrTiO3 are developed for solid oxide fuel cellsThe interface characteristics are investigated to understand the fast ionic transport obtained in the heterostructure.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Schottky junction effect is proposed by taking account of work functions and electronic affinities for the first time.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: AbstractSince colossal ionic conductivity was detected in the planar heterostructures consisting of fluorite and perovskite, heterostructures have drawn great research interest as potential electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, so far, the practical uses of such promising material have failed to materialize in SOFCs due to the short circuit risk caused by SrTiO3.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, a series of fluorite/perovskite heterostructures made of Sm-doped CeO2 and SrTiO3 (SDC-STO) are developed in a new bulk-heterostructure form and evaluated as electrolytes.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The prepared cells exhibit a peak power density of 892 mW cm(-2) along with open circuit voltage of 1.1 V at 550 degrees C for the optimal composition of 4SDC-6STO.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Further electrical studies reveal a high ionic conductivity of 0.05-0.14 S cm(-1) at 450-550 degrees C, which shows remarkable enhancement compared to that of simplex SDC.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Via AC impedance analysis, it has been shown that the small grain-boundary and electrode polarization resistances play the major roles in resulting in the superior performance.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, a Schottky junction effect is proposed by considering the work functions and electronic affinities to interpret the avoidance of short circuit in the SDC-STO cell.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Our findings thus indicate a new insight to design electrolytes for low-temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: A Bulk-Heterostructure Nanocomposite Electrolyte of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-SrTiO3 for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
